stars.description: When HP is below 40%, 8% HP will be restored when each turn starts.
Increase 5% Res rate for each round survived, max 20%
When HP is below 40%, 12% HP will be restored, and debuff will be dispelled (petrification excluded) when each turn starts.
Each round survived, increase 10% Ult DMG, max 100%.
The lower the HP proportion, the higher the DMG caused by (normal attack, skill, ULT), max 50%.
At the beginning of the battle, decrease all enemy male fighters 8% Res Rate and DEF, lasts all battle.
When releasing skills, if the target is male, 50% chance to reduce 200 Rage.
In the third round, a random female fighter gets full Rage.
In deployed team, for every female fighter present (the number of fighters is counted separately per round), all female fighters will get 5% MG increase, max 20%.
In Round 3, 2 random female fighters get full rage, and 20% DMG and Res rate bonus for 1 round
At the beginning of the battle, reduce all enemy 8% crit rate, double for rear fighters, lasts 2 rounds.
In the first 2 rounds, when receiving 40% HP in damage in a single hit, DMG received capped at 40% of HP.
Dispels control effects (dizziness, freeze, soul burning, petrification, taunting, etc.)
Round 3 onwards, damage received will not exceed 30%, increase Block rate and Crit Res by 20%.
Each time you receive a control effect (dizziness, freeze, soul burning, petrification, taunting, etc.), restore 8% health, triggers up to 2 times per turn
When battle starts, in odd round, deal war god influence upon a random enemy fighter (body size decrease, reduce 15% DEF and DMG Res rate, DMG decreases by 15%, for 1 round)
When battle starts, increase own 15% crit rate, for the whole battle
At the beginning of the battle, all the God of War effects are increased to 30%.
MG of normal attack and small skill increase by 60% against enemy fighters who bear war god influence.

Since Round 3, get war god arrival effect, overall attribute increase (body size increase, increase 20% own ATK, DEF, DMG rate, and DMG Res rate), for whole battle, and recover 30% max HP immediately. (This effect will not be triggered if in transformation or death effect in Round 3)
Will decrease killer's MG & DEF by 50% after death, lasts 2 rounds, cannot be dispelled
Randomly reduce the 2 enemy fighters 200 Rage after death
After death, restore 20%-40% of max HP to all allies. The less fighters remaining, higher the recovery.
After the death, reduce enemy's front fighters 20% Crit and block rate, last 2 rounds, can not be dispelled
After death, reduce enemy rear fighters 20% crit rate and crit power for 2 rounds, cannot be dispelled
Increase 20% small skill rate and 25% small skill DMG.
When the wearer releasing small skill, it makes extra Storm Cut effect upon enemy fighters, which could deal DMG of 8% max HP each round for whole battle. The effect is stackable and clearable.

The wearer could get Frenzy Wind effect. After releasing ULT, there will be 50% chance to get full rage and release ÜLt again maximum one trager per rouna) but with oniy 50% DMG. If this effect is triggered, no rage recovers during the round.
Normal attack will have additional Storm Cut effect. The effect increases by 12% and it is not clearable.
The rate and DMG of Frenzy Wind effect increase to 75%, which has no influence on rage recovery. If the target was not killed, reduce up to 2 targets' 15% DEF rate and MG Res rate for 1 round.

When being attacked by the enemy, the fighter equipped with Wolf FightSoul devours 30% of the attacker's DMG and Res Rate for 2 rounds (the effect ignores the immunity to Debuff, cannot be dispelled, cannot be stacked, and won't be effective when own shield exists).

When being attacked by the enemy, the fighter equipped with Wolf FightSoul devours 30% of the attacker's DMG and Res Rate for 2 rounds (the effect ignores the immunity to Debuff, cannot be dispelled, cannot be stacked, and won't be effective when own shield exists).

When being attacked by the enemy, the fighter equipped with Wolf FightSoul will inflict "Rift" to the attacker (decreasing Rage restoration speed of the attacker by 50% and healing rate by 60%, the effect ignores the immunity to Debuff and can't be dispelled); the "Rift" will disappear when the enemy takes the damage by own fighter in own round.

When the "Rift" disappears, 150 Rages of the target will be decreased, and all the Debuff or the fighter who equipped with Wolf and Lamb FightSoul will be cleared. If Lamb FightSoul also exists, an extra Rage of the target will be decreased (Lamb FightSoul Star multiplied by 20)

Wolf FightSoul releases Plague to contaminate all the enemies. When an enemy dies, the Rage of a random fighter around him or her will be decreased by 400, and ATK and DEF of the fighter will be decreased for 2 rounds ( the effect ignores the immunity to Debuff and can't be dispelled); if Lamb FightSoul also exists, the contagion will come with Plague Virus effect. If the star of the Wolf FightSoul reaches 3, two fighters will be contaminated; if the star of the Wolf FightSoul reaches 5, three fighters will be contaminated.

Lamb FightSoul will apply the "Power of the Dead" to all the fighters on own side at the beginning of the battle. When the fighter on own side dies for the first time, the damage of the small skill and ULT Res of all the fighters on own side will be increased by 20% for 2 rounds (the more the deaths, the higher the boost, and the effect can't be dispelled).

Lamb FightSoul will apply the "Curse of the Dead" to all the enemies at the beginning of the battle. When an enemy dies for the first time, the damage of the small skill and ULT Res of all the fighters on own side will be decreased by 10% for 2 rounds the more the deaths, the higher the Debuff, and the effect can't be dispelled).

Sacrifice: When a fighter equipped with Lamb FightSoul is controlled, 10% of MAX HP will be restored to the rest of the fighters on own side when own turn starts, and 5% of MAX HP will be restored to the rest of the fighters on own side when the enemy's turn starts, the HP restored will be increased by 50% when Wolf FightSoul also exists.

Lamb FightSoul will apply the "Soul Conversion" to all the enemies at the beginning of the battle. When an enemy dies for the first time, a fighter on own side will be enchanted randomly. Res Rate of the fighter who is enchanted will be increased by 40% for 2 rounds, and this fighter will have a chance to resurrect with a certain amount of HP when he or she dies. After the resurrection, all Rages will be inherited (the effect won't work for the fighter with the resurrection skill or the one who has been enchanted). If the Wolf FightSoul also exists when the fighter is enchanted, Wolf FightSoul Star multiplied by 5% of MAX HP of the fighter will be increased when he or she resurrects.

Lamb FightSoul will apply the "Lamb's Return" to all the fighters on own side at the beginning of the battle. When the fighter on own side dies for the first time, he or she will resurrect. 50% of the HP lost of the fighter equipped with the Lamb FightSoul will be restored, and DMG Res of the surrounding fighters will be increased by 30% for 2 rounds (can't be dispelled). When the Wolf FightSoul also exists, 20% HP of a random fighter around the fighter equipped with the Lamb FightSoul will be restored. If the star of the Wolf FightSoul reaches 3, two fighters' HP will be restored; if the star of the Wolf FightSoul reaches 5, three fighters' HP will be restored. When the fighter equipped with the Lamb FightSoul dies, all the Buff will double, and all the fighters on own side will enjoy the DMG Res increasing effect.
It could only be worn by DPS and GANK fighters. The wearer could absorb 10% MG Reflect from nearby allies.
Normal attack and small skill could reduce 10% DEF and make Bleeding effect upon the target for 1 round. (Lose 10% Max HP at the start of the round and reduce 70% healing effect for 1 round)
When the wearer's HP is less than 50% and under attack, the wearer could steal 20% HP from 1 enemy with more than 30% HP. (Up to 3 times)

The MG Reflect absorbed from nearby allies increases by 100% (up to 40%). ULT could make Bleeding effect upon 2 enemy fighters randomly for 2 rounds (Lose 10% Max HP at the start of the round and reduce 50% healing effect for 2 rounds)

When the wearer dies, reduce all enemy fighters 15% ATK and DEF for 2 rounds (not clearable), and make Bleeding effect upon all enemy fighters for 2 rounds (Lose 10% Max HP at the start of the round and reduce 50% healing effect for 2 rounds, not clearable)
When releasing a skill, will cast debuff on enemy (all damage reduced by 20%, all damage received increased by 10% for 2 rounds)
At the beginning of the battle, permanently reduce the enemy's total 8% DEF, and effect on front row is increased by 50%.
At the beginning of the battle, odd-number rounds will randomly cast debuff on one enemy, dizziness, paralysis, freeze, or silence for 1 round.
At the beginning of the battle, randomly dispel all buff from an enemy each round.

Releasing ULT makes the target enter cursed state (reduce 100% crit rate, 100% block rate, lasts 2 rounds). When the attack targets include more than 2 people, two random targets will get this effect which cannot be dispelled.

At the beginning of the battle, increase DEF by 10% and decrease DMG by 20%. Each 2 rounds will attach devils to 2 enemies randomly (fighters with Devil FightSoul will not become targets), and these fighters will also increase DEF by 10% and decrease DMG by 20%.
At the beginning of the battle, increase 10% ULT Res and decrease 20% ULT DMG.

At the beginning of the battle, decrease 20% Control-free. If the fighter get controlled (frozen, paralyzed, stunned, silence, taunted, petrified), the effect will be reflected to enemies which are attached with devils (1 round).
Devil FightSoul's debuff will increase by 50% for PS and GANK fighters and buff will increase by 50% for DEF fighters.
Each round recover 10% max HP. When get nonfatal damage, the 50% of damage will be reflected to enemies which are attached with devils.

The additional effect of the FightSoul will be activated when it's equipped by the Flame fighters that don' t belong to Kusanagi clan. Flame Shield effect (increase Res Rate and Reflection of the equipper by 10%, be immune to Burning and Soul Burning status, Which lasts for the whole battle) will be added to the equipper.

Soul Burning effect (decrease 8% of HP and 200 Rage of the target; if there are more than 2 main targets when the equipper is attacking, 2 random targets will get Soul Burning status) will be added to ULT and small skills of the equipper for 1 round.
Increase Crit Resistance and small skill Resistance of the Flame allies by 20%
Improve to Kusanagi Flame's Soul Burning (prevent the target from getting the Rage returning effect for 1 round and reduce the target's HP healing rate by 50%)
For every additional Flame fighter on own side and Aid Formation, increase all Flame allies' Crit by 8% (up to 24%) and Crit Power by 4% (up to 12%).
